public static class ParseCmd.Builder
extends java.lang.Object

Class Builder is defined as public static to be used by the enclosing class using a Builder pattern

Constructor Detail

ParseCmd.Builder

public ParseCmd.Builder()
Constructor Builder offers a way to build a Map of parameters, parms, that can be later used by the enclosing class, ParseCmd. Each entry in Parms has a name, default value, regular expression, flag indicating whether it is required or it is optional and a message String used to display a help/error message as needed

Method Detail

parm

public ParseCmd.Builder parm(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String value)
Define a parameter by given it a name and a fefault value

Parameters:
name - parm's name
value - parm's default value
Returns:
Reference to Builder to enable method chaining

parm

public ParseCmd.Builder parm(java.lang.String name)
Defines a parameter without a default value; a monadic parameter

Parameters:
name - parameter name. Internally it is defined as parm(name, "1")
Returns:
reference to Builder; allows statement chaining

Returns:
reference to this, Builder, to enable method chaining

msg

public ParseCmd.Builder msg(java.lang.String desc)
Stores message String for last defined parameter

Parameters:

Returns:
